Description: Saudi Research and Marketing Group (known as: SRMG) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May 2006. SRMG operates within the Media sector focusing on Publishing. It has Companies operating across Jordan and Saudi Arabia. SRMG is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2000.
